title: Code stuck at testing
body:
**Latest issue** : no change in test.py, except manually coding the best_file_name. No change in test.sh.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/82636358/174804171-23337fdc-5928-4f13-8cf8-27cd369c59ba.png)



**Below is the earlier issues I faced, probably we can ignore them, if we have the solution for above.**:
downloaded the data_depth_selection, unzipped it, and then ran the following command :
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/82636358/174739247-769049d4-2f7b-4d7f-b30e-faaa8f864fc8.png)

The o/p is :
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/82636358/174739370-36aeb27d-ea64-452a-bb0e-f74886c0f7f0.png)
Ignore the line numbers. I use them inside test.py for debugging.
I changed the default value for --input_type inside test.py from "rgb", to "depth".

If I keep the --input_type to '"rgb" as default, I get the following o/p :
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/82636358/174741378-60b673cb-4015-4068-8182-6a3548dd74b5.png)


Could it be some issue with channel ? I see that depth_images in KItti dataset are 16 bit-depth (acc. to my understanding, that is equal to 2 channels), and rgb are 4 bit-depth (3 channels), whereas in test.py, its channel_in=1 for depth and 4 for rgb.

For input_type = 'rgb', channel_in=3, the o/p is:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/82636358/174745839-839acc8c-38ac-401e-a4cc-53b5e4d09be5.png)

I used the solution, pasted below, from this website https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/tensor-size-mismatch/31897/2
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/82636358/174746555-aa58e941-9251-4933-ac49-d7d9ece42c77.png)
In test.py, for input_type = 'depth', channel_in=2
In test.sh, I changed the removed the highlighted part :
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/82636358/174749211-b833117f-9d90-4d43-83ad-627fd2ec55b7.png)
to the following
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/82636358/174749467-4d98a374-9f67-4bb0-9b51-326dfbf909e8.png)
O/p :
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/82636358/174749596-4974efab-9a1c-471b-a8e2-130e01da3c64.png)
